suggest.meta_keywords: Upstash Rate Limiting, edge computing, traffic management, DDoS protection, rate limit configuration, edge functions, network security, traffic spikes, penalty system, Azion Marketplace
suggest.meta_description: Discover how Upstash Rate Limiting manages traffic, prevents bottlenecks, and protects from DDoS at the edge. Learn to configure rate limits with edge functions on Azion.

current.meta_description: This integration allows you to control incoming traffic right at the edge and protect your applications.
